meanings.definition: A Mexican vine (Turbina corymbosa) with hallucinogenic seeds.
meanings.sent1: The ololiuqui vine grows in Mexico.
meanings.sent2: People believe that ololiuqui seeds have special powers.
meanings.sent3: The shaman collected ololiuqui seeds for his healing ceremony.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were like ololiuqui seeds, bringing visions of the unknown.
meanings.sent5: The hallucinogenic effects of ololiuqui are well-known in traditional medicine.

meanings.definition: The seeds of this vine, used in traditional medicine and shamanic rituals.
meanings.sent1: He ground the ololiuqui seeds to make a healing potion.
meanings.sent2: In ancient rituals, ololiuqui seeds were considered sacred.
meanings.sent3: The medicine man carried a pouch filled with ololiuqui seeds.
meanings.sent4: Her mind wandered like scattered ololiuqui seeds in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of ololiuqui seeds filled the room during the ceremony.
